sourcesContent:
import './styles.css'; const CharCard = ({name, image, status, species, gender, type, origin, location}) => { return ( <> {status === 'Dead' ?

  • {name}

    • Status of life: {status}

    Species: {species}

    Gender: {gender}

    Type: {type}

    Origin: {origin}

    Location: {location}

    :

  • {name}

    • Status of life: {status}

    Species: {species}

    Gender: {gender}

    Type: {type}

    Origin: {origin}

    Location: {location}

    } ) } export default CharCard;
